title: Age Puzzle
problem: Sarah is currently 3 times as old as her daughter Emma. In 12 years, Sarah will be twice as old as Emma. How old are Sarah and Emma now?
expected_solution: Sarah is 36 years old, Emma is 12 years old
expected_reasoning: Let Emma's current age = x years
In 12 years: Emma will be (x + 12) years old
In 12 years: Sarah will be (3x + 12) years old
Given condition: Sarah will be twice Emma's age in 12 years
Verify: In 12 years, Emma=24, Sarah=48, and 48 = 2×24 ✓
